# Design: Test Dashboard Demo

> **Status:** Draft
> **Author:** Claude
> **Created:** 2026-01-24

## Architecture Overview

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  Spec Workflow Dashboard                                     │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                             │
│  ┌──────────────┐    ┌──────────────────────────────────┐  │
│  │  Spec List   │    │  Spec Details                    │  │
│  │              │    │                                  │  │
│  │  ○ spec-1    │───▶│  Requirements: ████████░░ 80%   │  │
│  │  ● spec-2    │    │  Design:       ██████████ 100%  │  │
│  │  ○ spec-3    │    │  Tasks:        ░░░░░░░░░░ 0%    │  │
│  │              │    │                                  │  │
│  │              │    │  [Approve] [Request Changes]     │  │
│  └──────────────┘    └──────────────────────────────────┘  │
│                                                             │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

## Data Model

### Spec
```typescript
interface Spec {
  name: string;           // kebab-case identifier
  status: SpecStatus;
  phases: {
    requirements: PhaseStatus;
    design: PhaseStatus;
    tasks: PhaseStatus;
  };
  createdAt: Date;
  updatedAt: Date;
}

type SpecStatus = 'draft' | 'in-review' | 'approved' | 'implemented';
type PhaseStatus = 'pending' | 'draft' | 'in-review' | 'approved';
```

## API Endpoints

| Method | Path | Description |
|--------|------|-------------|
| GET | `/api/specs` | List all specs |
| GET | `/api/specs/:name` | Get spec details |
| POST | `/api/specs/:name/approve` | Approve a phase |
| POST | `/api/specs/:name/request-changes` | Request changes |

## UI Components

1. **SpecList** - Sidebar showing all specs
2. **SpecDetails** - Main panel with phase progress
3. **ApprovalButtons** - Approve/Request Changes actions
4. **ProgressBar** - Visual phase completion

## Implementation Notes

This is a test spec to demonstrate the dashboard workflow. The actual implementation already exists in the spec-workflow MCP server.
